titleStmt.title: A second letter concerning the Holy Trinity pursuant to the former from the same hand : occasioned by a letter there inserted from one unknown / by John Wallis.
titleStmt.author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703.
W. J.

notesStmt.note: The text of a letter from W.J. to Wallis, with Wallis's reply.
"I have, since yours, received ... a letter directed to me, subscribed W.J., but I know not from whom ..."--p. 2.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
